plugin.name: CustomUI
plugin.author: federico.ferri.it@gmail.com
plugin.description: API functions for creating custom user interfaces.

command.name: create
command.description: Create a window.

param.name: uiHandle
param.description: a handle to the created UI

command.name: destroy
command.description: Destroy a window.

command.name: getSliderValue
command.description: Get the value of a slider widget.

command.name: setSliderValue
command.description: Set the value of a slider widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getEditValue
command.description: Get the value of a edit widget.

command.name: setEditValue
command.description: Set the value of a edit widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getSpinboxValue
command.description: Get the value of a spinbox widget.

command.name: setSpinboxValue
command.description: Set the value of a spinbox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getCheckboxValue
command.description: Get the value of a checkbox widget.

command.name: setCheckboxValue
command.description: Set the value of a checkbox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getRadiobuttonValue
command.description: Get the value of a radiobutton widget.

command.name: setRadiobuttonValue
command.description: Set the value of a radiobutton widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getLabelText
command.description: Get the text of a label widget.

command.name: setLabelText
command.description: Set the text of a label widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: insertComboboxItem
command.description: Insert an item in a combobox widget.

param.name: index
param.description: If the index is equal to or higher than the total number of items, the new item is appended to the list of existing items. If the index is zero or negative, the new item is prepended to the list of existing items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: removeComboboxItem
command.description: Remove an item from a combobox widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getComboboxItemCount
command.description: Get the number of items in the specified combobox widget.

command.name: getComboboxItemText
command.description: Get the text of an item in a combobox widget.

command.name: getComboboxItems
command.description: Get the content of a combobox.

command.name: setComboboxItems
command.description: Populate a combobox widget with the specified items, and set the selected item to the specified index.

param.name: index
param.description: Index of selected item after inserting all the items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setComboboxSelectedIndex
command.description: Change the selected item index in a combobox widget.

param.name: index
param.description: Index of selected item after inserting all the items.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: hide
command.description: Hide the UI window.

command.name: show
command.description: Show the UI window.

command.name: isVisible
command.description: Check if the window is visible.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: getPosition
command.description: Get the position of a UI window.

command.name: setPosition
command.description: Set the position of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getSize
command.description: Get the size of a UI window.

command.name: setSize
command.description: Set the size of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getTitle
command.description: Get the title of a UI window.

command.name: setTitle
command.description: Set the title of a UI window.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: setImageData
command.description: Set image content using specified bitmap (RGB888) data.

command.name: setEnabled
command.description: Enable or disable a widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getCurrentTab
command.description: Get the current tab index of a tabs widget.

command.name: setCurrentTab
command.description: Set the current tab index in a tabs widget.

param.name: suppressEvents
param.description: if true, no event will be generated from this call

command.name: getWidgetVisibility
command.description: Get the visibility status of a widget.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: setWidgetVisibility
command.description: Hide or show a widget.

param.name: visibility
param.description: true if the window is visible, false otherwise

command.name: getCurrentEditWidget
command.description: Get the edit widget with focus and selected text.

param.name: id
param.description: widget id of an edit widget, or -1 if no edit widget was focused and had selected text.

command.name: setCurrentEditWidget
command.description: Set the edit widget focus and selected text.

param.name: id
param.description: widget id. this value can be -1, in which case the function will do nothing.

command.name: replot
command.description: Refresh all the plots of a plot widget.

item.name: time
item.description: a curve with an X-simple domain, i.e. y = f(x)

item.name: xy
item.description: a parametric curve, i.e. x = fx(t), y = fy(t)

struct.name: curve_options
struct.description: Extra options for the curve creation function . Create this data structure in the form of a hash table, e.g.: {line_size=3, add_to_legend=false, selectable=true}

param.name: line_style
param.description: style of the pen used to draw the line. see .

param.name: add_to_legend
param.description: if false, the curve will not be added to the legend

param.name: selectable
param.description: if false, the curve points cannot be selected and will not react to click events

param.name: track
param.description: if true, enable the mouse tracker

command.name: addCurve
command.description: Adds a curve to a plot widget.

param.name: color
param.description: color of the curve, as RGB values in the 0...255 range

param.name: options
param.description: data structure holding extra options. see .

command.name: addCurveTimePoints
command.description: Adds time points to the specified curve of the plot widget.

command.name: addCurveXYPoints
command.description: Adds points to the specified curve of the plot widget.

param.name: t
param.description: t values (i.e. the curve parameter, used also to determine how points are connected, according to natural ordering of t)

command.name: clearCurve
command.description: Clear points of the specified curve of the plot widget.

command.name: removeCurve
command.description: Remove the specified curve from the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotRanges
command.description: Set the ranges of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotXRange
command.description: Set the X range of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotYRange
command.description: Set the Y range of the plot widget.

command.name: growPlotRanges
command.description: Increase the ranges of the plot widget by a fixed amount.

command.name: growPlotXRange
command.description: Increase the X range of the plot widget.

command.name: growPlotYRange
command.description: Increase the Y range of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotLabels
command.description: Set the labels of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotXLabel
command.description: Set the X label of the plot widget.

command.name: setPlotYLabel
command.description: Set the Y label of the plot widget.

command.name: rescaleAxes
command.description: Rescales the axes such that the specified curve in the plot is fully visible.

param.name: onlyEnlargeX
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

param.name: onlyEnlargeY
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

command.name: rescaleAxesAll
command.description: Rescales the axes such that all curves in the plot are fully visible.

param.name: onlyEnlargeX
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

param.name: onlyEnlargeY
param.description: makes sure the x ranges are only expanded, never reduced

command.name: setMouseOptions
command.description: Set plot widget options for interacting with mouse.

param.name: panX
param.description: if true, panning (by dragging with the mouse) the X axis is allowed

param.name: panY
param.description: if true, panning (by dragging with the mouse) the Y axis is allowed

param.name: zoomX
param.description: if true, zooming (by mouse wheel) the X axis is allowed

param.name: zoomY
param.description: if true, zooming (by mouse wheel) the Y axis is allowed

command.name: setLegendVisibility
command.description: Set visibility of the plot legend (default is hidden).

param.name: visible
param.description: if true, the plot legend will be visible

command.name: getCurveData
command.description: Get the data contained in the specified curve.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the clicked button

script-function.name: oncloseCallback
script-function.description: Callback for window close event. It will be called when the user clicks the close button of the window. When an onclose callback is specified, the window will not close automatically when the user clicks the window close button.

script-function.name: onPlottableClickCallback
script-function.description: Callback for plot widget plottableClick event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

param.name: index
param.description: the index of the clicked point in the curve

param.name: x
param.description: the x value of the clicked point

param.name: y
param.description: the y value of the clicked point

script-function.name: onLegendClickCallback
script-function.description: Callback for plot widget legendClick event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

script-function.name: onCellActivateCallback
script-function.description: Callback for table widget cellActivated event.

param.name: id
param.description: the ID of the plot widget

param.name: row
param.description: the row index (zero based) of the activated cell

param.name: column
param.description: the column index (zero based) of the activated cell

param.name: type
param.description: the mouse event type, one of the values from
